4810 /**
4811  * Renders SequenceNavigator
4812  * @class
4813  * @private
4814  */
4815 tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
4816 
4817   // Navigation Animations
4818   ANIM: new tau.fx.Transition({
4819     timingFunction: 'ease-in-out', 
4820     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4821   ANIM_IN_FADE: new tau.fx.Transition({
4822     timingFunction: 'ease', 
4823     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4824   ANIM_OUT_FADE: new tau.fx.Transition({
4825     timingFunction: 'ease', 
4826     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4827 
4828   /**
4829    * root DOM element에 설정되는 기본 style Class
4830    */
4831   $base: 'tau-sequencenavigator',
4832 
4833   /**
4834    * style Class 
4835    * <p />
4836    * template에서 사용하는 style Class를 정의한다.
4837    */
4838   $styleClass: {
4839     navigationContainer: 'tau-navbar',
4840     toolbarContainer: 'toolBar', // TODO: 삭제될 예정
4841     content: '-content',
4842     hasnavigationbar: 'tau-navbar-padding'
4843   },
4844 
4845   /** 
4846    * html template
4847    * style class는 <code>${key}</code>로 묶어서 표시한다.
4848    * {@link $base}, {@link $styleClass}에 설정되어 있는 style class가 <code>${key}</code>를 대체한다.
4849    */
4850   _template: ['<div class="${base} ${hasnavigationbar}">',
4851                 '<div class=${navigationContainer}></div>',
4852                 '<div class=${toolbarContainer}></div>',
4853                 '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
4854               '</div>'],
4855 
4856   /**
4857    * $dom 구조를 설정한다.
4858    * <p/> 
4859    * 최상위 {@link tau.ui.ROOT_KEY}를 제외한 나머지에 대해서 설정하면 된다.
4860    * @param {Object} $dom key에 해당하는 DOM Element를 가지는 객체
4861    * @param {String} $base base style class
4862    * @param {HTMLElement} root root가 되는 DOM Element
4863    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer._initializeDOM
4864    */
4865   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
4866     $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
4867     $dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
4868     $dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
4869   },
4870               
4871   /**
4872    * $dom의 key가 추가될 parent DOM element를 반환한다.
4873    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
4874    * @param {String} key $dom 키값
4875    * @param {Boolean} [createElement=true] 
4876    * @returns {HTMLElement}
4877    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement
4878    */
4879   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
4880     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
4881     switch (key) {
4882     case tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY:
4883       return $dom[key];
4884     default:
4885       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
4886     }
4887   },
4888   
4889   /**
4890    * push을 위한 render.
4891    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체 DOM structure
4892    * @param {Object} pushed 들어오는 Controller 컨텐트
4893    * @param {Object} active 나가는 Controller 컨텐트
4894    * @param {function} callbackFn Draw가 완료된 후 호출되는 콜백함수
4895    */
4896   renderPush: function ($renderData, pushed, active, callbackFn) {
4897     var $dom = $renderData.$dom,
4898         pushedCtrlDOM = pushed.ctrl.getDOM(),
4899         pushedNavDOM = pushed.nav.getDOM(),
4900         pushedCtrlDOMWidth = pushedCtrlDOM.offsetWidth;
4901     
4902     // Option to disable navigation bar
4903     if (pushed.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
4904       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
4905       tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
4906     } else if (active && !active.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
4907       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
4908       tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
4909     }
4910 
4911     if (pushed.nav) {
4912       //pushedNavDOM.style.display = 'none'; // title max-width를 설정하기 위해 'none'으로 처리하면 안됨.
4913       pushedNavDOM.style.opacity = 0;
4914       pushed.nav.draw($dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY]);
4915     }
4916     if (pushed.opts && pushed.opts.animation) {      
4917       pushedCtrlDOM.style.display = 'none';
4918       pushedCtrlDOM.style.left = pushedCtrlDOMWidth + 'px'; // Align to the right of active
4919       pushedCtrlDOM.style.visibility = 'visible';
4920       pushedCtrlDOM.style.display = null;
4921       
4922       // Animate the parent content element
4923       this.ANIM.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(-' + pushedCtrlDOMWidth + 'px)', { 
4924         onEnd: function (e) {
4925           active.ctrl.getDOM().style.display  = 'none';
4926           e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
4927           pushedCtrlDOM.style.left  = null;
4928           callbackFn();
4929       }
4930       });
4931 
4932       // Animate incoming/outgoing navigation bars
4933       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '1');
4934       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(0)', {
4935         onEnd: function (e) {
4936           e.target.style.zIndex = null;
4937         }
4938       });
4939 
4940       this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '0');
4941       this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(-' + pushedCtrlDOMWidth/2 + 'px)', { 
4942         onEnd: function (e) {
4943           e.target.style.display  = 'none';
4944         }
4945       });
4946       
4947       pushed.nav.setStyles({
4948         opacity: 0, // prevents nav bar flicker
4949         zIndex: 1,
4950         webkitTransform: 'translateX(' +  pushedCtrlDOMWidth/2 + 'px)',
4951       });
4952       pushed.nav.setVisible(true);      
4953       
4954       
4955       var self = this;
4956       
4957       window.setTimeout(function(){        
4958         self.ANIM.animate($dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY], {delay:-1});
4959         self.ANIM_IN_FADE.animate(pushedNavDOM, {delay:-1});
4960         self.ANIM_OUT_FADE.animate(active.nav.getDOM(), {delay:-1});
4961       }, 0);      
4962     } else {
4963       if (pushed.nav) {
4964         
4965         pushed.nav.setStyles({
4966           opacity: 1,
4967         });
4968         pushed.nav.setVisible(true);      
4969       }
4970       // Coordinate to same positions even after non-animated push
4971       if (active && active.ctrl) {
4972         active.nav.getDOM().style.display = 'none';
4973       }
4974       callbackFn();
4975     }
4976   },
4977 
4978   /**
4979    * pop을 위한 render.
4980    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체 DOM structure
4981    * @param {Object} popped 나가는 Controller 컨텐트
4982    * @param {Object} active 들어오는 Controller 컨텐트
4983    * @param {function} callbackFn Draw가 완료된 후 호출되는 콜백함수
4984    */
4985   renderPop: function ($renderData, popped, active, callbackFn) {
4986     var $dom = $renderData.$dom,
4987         activeCtrlDOM, activeCtrlDOMWidth;
4988     
4989     // Align incoming/outgoing contents next to each other
4990     if (active && active.ctrl) {
4991       activeCtrlDOM = active.ctrl.getDOM();
4992       activeCtrlDOM.style.left  = '-100%';
4993     }
4994 
4995     // Option to disable navigation bar
4996     if (active.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
4997       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
4998       tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
4999     } else if (popped && popped.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
5000       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
5001       tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
5002     }
5003 
5004     /** @inner Clears navigation bar position and executes callback */
5005     function doCallback() {
5006       if (active.nav) { // Properly displays non-animated/hideNavigationBar pops 
5007         active.nav.setStyles({
5008           opacity: null,
5009           left: null
5010         });
5011         active.nav.setVisible(true);
5012       }
5013       callbackFn();
5014     }
5015 
5016     if (active.nav) {
5017       active.nav.setStyles({
5018         opacity: 0
5019       });
5020 //      active.nav.setVisible(true);
5021       active.nav.draw($dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY]);
5022     }
5023     if (active.tool) {
5024       active.tool.draw($dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY]);
5025       active.tool.getDOM().style.display = '';
5026     }
5027 
5028     if (popped.opts && popped.opts.animation) {
5029 
5030       // Animate the parent content element
5031       activeCtrlDOM.style.display  = '';
5032       activeCtrlDOMWidth = activeCtrlDOM.offsetWidth;
5033       this.ANIM.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(' + activeCtrlDOMWidth + 'px)', { 
5034         onEnd: function (e) {
5035           activeCtrlDOM.style.left  = null;
5036           e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
5037           popped.ctrl.getDOM().style.display = 'none';
5038           callbackFn();
5039         }
5040       });
5041 
5042       // Animate incoming/outgoing navigation bars
5043       if (popped && popped.nav) {
5044         
5045         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '0');
5046         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(' + activeCtrlDOMWidth / 2 + 'px)', { 
5047           onEnd: function (e) {
5048             e.target.style.display  = 'none';
5049             e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
5050           }
5051         });
5052         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.animate(popped.nav.getDOM()); 
5053       }
5054       
5055       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '1');
5056       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(0)', {
5057         onEnd: function (e) {
5058           e.target.style.zIndex  = null;
5059         }
5060       });
5061       
5062       active.nav.setStyles({
5063         webkitTransform: 'translateX(-' + activeCtrlDOMWidth / 2  +'px)',
5064         zIndex: 1
5065       });
5066       
5067       active.nav.setVisible(true);
5068       
5069       var self = this;
5070       window.setTimeout(function(){       
5071         self.ANIM.animate($dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY], {delay:-1});
5072         self.ANIM_IN_FADE.animate(active.nav.getDOM(), {delay:-1});
5073       }, 0);
5074       
5075     } else {
5076       // Coordinate to same positions even after non-animated pop
5077       activeCtrlDOM.style.left = '';
5078       active.nav.setVisible(true);
5079       doCallback();
5080     }
5081   }
5082 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
5083 
5084 /**
5085  * Renders ParallelNavigator
5086  * @class
5087  * @private
5088  */
5089 tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5090 
5091   /**
5092    * root DOM element에 설정되는 기본 style Class
5093    */
5094   $base: 'tau-tabbarnavigator',
5095 
5096   /**
5097    * style Class 
5098    * <p />
5099    * template에서 사용하는 style Class를 정의한다.
5100    */
5101   $styleClass: {
5102     hastabbar: 'tau-hastabbar',
5103     tabbar: 'tau-tabbar',
5104     content: '-content'
5105   },  
5106 
5107   /** 
5108    * html template
5109    * style class는 <code>${key}</code>로 묶어서 표시한다.
5110    * {@link $base}, {@link $styleClass}에 설정되어 있는 style class가 <code>${key}</code>를 대체한다.
5111    */
5112   _template: ['<div class="tau ${base} ${hastabbar}">',
5113                 '<div class=${tabbar}></div>',
5114                 '<div class=toolBar></div>',
5115                 '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
5116               '</div>'],
5117   
5118   /**
5119    * $dom 구조를 설정한다.
5120    * <p/> 
5121    * 최상위 {@link tau.ui.ROOT_KEY}를 제외한 나머지에 대해서 설정하면 된다.
5122    * @param {Object} $dom key에 해당하는 DOM Element를 가지는 객체
5123    * @param {String} $base base style class
5124    * @param {HTMLElement} root root가 되는 DOM Element
5125    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer._initializeDOM
5126    */
5127   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5128     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
5129     $dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
5130     $dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5131   },
5132 
5133   
5134   /**
5135    * $dom의 key가 추가될 parent DOM element를 반환한다.
5136    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5137    * @param {String} key $dom 키값 
5138    * @param {Boolean} [createElement=true]
5139    * @returns {HTMLElement}
5140    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement
5141    */
5142   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5143     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5144     switch (key) {
5145     case tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY:
5146       return $dom[key];
5147     default:
5148       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5149     }
5150   },
5151   
5152   /**
5153    * tabbar를 보여준다.
5154    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5155    */
5156   showTabbar: function ($renderData) {
5157     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5158     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
5159     tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hastabbar);
5160   },
5161 
5162   /**
5163    * tabbar를 보이지 않게 한다.
5164    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5165    */
5166   hideTabbar: function ($renderData) {
5167     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5168     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
5169     tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hastabbar);
5170   }
5171 
5172 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);

5174 /**
5175  * Renders SplitViewController
5176  * @class
5177  * @private
5178  */
5179 tau.ui.SplitViewController.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5180   $base: 'tau-splitView',
5181   $styleClass: {
5182     splitviewContainer: 'tau-spContainer',
5183     leftContainer: 'tau-spLeftContainer',
5184     leftNaviBar: 'tau-spLeftNaviBar',
5185     separateBar: 'tau-separateBar',
5186     rightContainer: 'tau-spRightContainer',
5187     rightNaviBar: 'tau-spRightNaviBar',
5188     popOver : 'tau-popOverContainer'
5189   },
5190 
5191   _template:['<div class="${base} ${splitviewContainer}">',
5192              '<div class=${leftContainer}>',
5193              '<div class=${leftNaviBar}></div>',
5194              '</div>',
5195              '<div class=${separateBar}></div>',
5196              '<div class=${rightContainer}>',
5197              '<div class=${rightNaviBar}></div>',
5198              '</div>',             
5199              '</div>'],
5200              
5201   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5202     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
5203     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_NAVIBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0].childNodes[0];
5204     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];    
5205     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5206     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_NAVIBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[2].childNodes[0];
5207   },
5208   
5209   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5210     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5211     switch (key) {
5212     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY:
5213       return $dom[key];
5214     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY:
5215       return $dom[key];
5216     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_KEY:
5217       return $dom[key];
5218     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_NAVIBAR_KEY:
5219       return $dom[key];
5220     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_NAVIBAR_KEY:
5221       return $dom[key];
5222     default:
5223       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5224     }
5225   },
5226   
5227   setLeftCtrlToPopOver: function ($renderData, opts) {
5228     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5229     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.display = 'none';
5230     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.position = 'absolute'; 
5231     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.height = opts.popoverHeightSize;
5232     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY].style.width = '0px';
5233     
5234     tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY],
5235         this.$styleClass.popOver); 
5236   },
5237   
5238   setLeftCtrlToLeftContainer : function ($renderData) {
5239     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5240     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.display = '';
5241     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.position = 'relative'; 
5242     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.height = '';
5243     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY].style.width = '2px';
5244     tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY],
5245         this.$styleClass.popOver);
5246   },
5247   
5248   setOption: function ($renderData, opts) {
5249     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5250     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.width = opts.leftControllerWidth;
5251   }
5252   
5253 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
5254 /**
5255  * Renders PopoverController
5256  * @class
5257  * @private
5258  */
5259 tau.ui.PopoverController.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5260   $base: 'tau-popoverController',
5261   $styleClass: {
5262     masking: '-masking',
5263     content: '-content',
5264     direction: '-direction'
5265   },
5266   _template:['<div class=${base}>',
5267              '<div class=${base}${direction}></div>',
5268              '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
5269              '<div class=${base}${masking}></div>',
5270              '</div>'],
5271              
5272   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5273     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.DIRECTION_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];    
5274     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
5275     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.MASKING_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5276   },
5277   
5278   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5279     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5280     switch (key) {
5281     case tau.ui.PopoverController.CONTENT_KEY:
5282     case tau.ui.PopoverController.MASKING_KEY:
5283     case tau.ui.PopoverController.DIRECTION_KEY:
5284       return $dom[key];
5285     default:
5286       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5287     }
5288   },
5289 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
